structure.unit: CLASSIFICATION AND DESIGNATION OF OFFENSES -- AUTHORIZED DISPOSITION

law.catch_line: Responsibilities of persons held in home incarceration.
law.text: Any person serving his sentence under conditions of home incarceration shall be responsible for his food, housing, clothing, and medical care expenses, and shall be eligible for government benefits to the same extent as a person on probation, parole, postincarceration supervision, or conditional discharge.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch.2, sec.96, effective June 8, 2011. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1986.
